text: The Big Bus is a 1976 American action comedy movie directed by James Frawley and starring Joseph Bologna, Stockard Canning, John Beck, Ned Beatty, René Auberjonois, José Ferrer, Ruth Gordon, Harold Gould, Larry Hagman, Lynn Redgrave, Sally Kellerman, Richard Mulligan. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1976 action movies Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1970s road movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Big Bus
